name: COLLIER COUNTY, FLORIDA
sampleDescriptions: Legislation related to infrastructure funding and policy.
Local taxing authority and tax exempt status of municipal bonds.
H.R.1678 amending the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act concerning the statute of limitations for actions to recover disaster or emergency assistance payments.

Beach and water infrastructure funding.
Water Resources Development Act.
Energy and Water Appropriations funding.
